TopicTitle: Where did the training and scenarios go??!

Articles.Content:
Just launched KSP to do some training and they've all disappeared! How can I fix this?

(scenarios are also missing!)

Edited June 24, 2020 by KrisKelvin
Did you do some kind of cleanup on your "saves" directory? That is where all your Training and Scenarios are stored. If you want them back, you might be able to do a steam validation on your files.

On 6/24/2020 at 7:40 PM, bewing said:

Did you do some kind of cleanup on your "saves" directory? That is where all your Training and Scenarios are stored. If you want them back, you might be able to do a steam validation on your files.

ah. you know. I did! I was just deleting a bunch of old saved games. But why would that delete the training and scenarios? Surely they are 'out of the box'?

I'm not using steam, I'm using windows. I'll just have to reinstall, I guess.
